bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard for Information technology -- Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Part 1AB: Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery

ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard for Information technology -- Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Part 1AB: Station and Media Access Control Connectivity Discovery

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document defines a protocol and a set of managed objects that can be used for discovering the physical topology from adjacent stations in IEEE 802(R) LANs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
